coreQueryPageProvider.name: cad_bom_document_wc_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType IN ('CadDocument', 'BomDocument') AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:isVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND (elo:reference ILIKE '?**' OR ecm:fulltext.dc:title LIKE '?*')
